pullrequest.title: Add support for 16 bit Grayscale and RGB camera image types.

content.raw:
the doxygen for this function on gazebo8 is a little different

* #!/osrf/gazebo/src/bcde3cce06f83b520e6dccdfcd53cce585c00fca/gazebo/rendering/Camera.hh?at=gazebo8&fileviewer=file-view-default#Camera.hh-256

~~~
      /// \brief Get the depth of the image in bytes per pixel
      /// \return Depth of the image in bytes per pixel
~~~

which do you prefer?
